Package healthyBites.view

package healthyBites.view
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Class
    Description
    AnalysisSelectionPanel
    A central hub panel for selecting the type and date range for a "what-if" food swap analysis.
    AnalysisSelectionPanel.AnalysisType
    Enum to represent the different types of analysis a user can select.
    AverageImpactPanel
    A JPanel that displays the impact of a simulated food swap on the user's *average daily* nutrient intake.
    CFGAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel for analyzing a user's diet against Canada's Food Guide (CFG) recommendations.
    ChartVisualizationPanel
    A simple demonstration panel that displays a JFreeChart bar chart.
    CumulativeAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that displays the cumulative nutritional impact of a simulated food swap over a specified period.
    EditPanel
    A JPanel that provides a form for editing an existing user's profile information.
    GoalPanel
    A JPanel for setting up a food swap goal.
    GoalPanel2
    A JPanel that displays the results of a food swap.
    HomePanel
    The main dashboard or home screen panel for a logged-in user.
    LoginPanel
    A JPanel that provides the user login interface.
    MealHistoryPanel
    A JPanel that displays a scrollable history of meals.
    MealPanel
    A JPanel that provides a form for users to log a new meal.
    NutrientAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that allows users to select a date range and view an analysis of their average nutrient intake.
    PerMealAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that provides a detailed, per-meal breakdown of the nutritional impact of a food swap.
    RegisterPanel
    A JPanel that provides a user registration form.
    SwapSelectionPanel
    A JPanel that displays a list of suggested food items for a swap.
    SwapVisualizationPanel
    A JPanel that allows users to select and view different visualizations of food swap analysis data.
    SwapVisualizationPanel.VisualizationContext
    Enum representing different visualization contexts.
    ViewFacade
    The ViewFacade class acts as a single point of entry for the Controller to interact with the entire view component of the application.
